entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
